title: Making a Present
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Hey, Kotori-chan, does it not look weird?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Don’t worry, it doesn’t.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>But don’t you think that we should redo this part here a little bit? Won’t it be hard to move around in?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>It’s fine! Kotori guarantees it! You put your heart and soul into making this dress for Haruka-chan, so you should be more confident.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Uuu~, will she really be happy with this year’s birthday present?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>She definitely, definitely will. If it was me, I’d be so moved by it that I might cry.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Well, if you say so, then it must be right....! Aaah~, Kanata is so glad that Kanata talked to you a bunch about it, Kotori-chan! Thank you so much for helping me make this dress!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I’m happy that I could help you make such a wonderful dress. Come on, you’ve got to go now. Let me know about Haruka’s reaction next time, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah! Kanata will tell you all about it! Also, let me do something next time as a way to pay you back. Kanata will do anything for you~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Waaah, really!? Then, I’d love a homemade bento from you, Kanata-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
